website_summaries.verdict: A solid option for a travel wipes case designed for convenience.
pros: Good seal that keeps wipes moist
It also stands out for holding a good amount of wipes and its easy-to-grab design
cons: it didn't hold up well over time for all users

customer_reviews.title: Great size,  prefect for 1-2 days worth of wipes
customer_reviews.text: Love this little case. It's silicon strap is incredibly handy, holds probably a couple of days worth of wipes and the section to "pull them out by" (<- techincal term there) works great. If you live in very hot, dry climates, the case doesn't keep the moisture in for days on end, so be aware that if you've packed the case, left it in the car for a week (as an emergency stash) it may not be as wet as you'll need later. However, as your go-to to keep in your daily diaper bag, it works fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I love the sleek design
customer_reviews.text: If 3.5 stars was a option, that's where this product would fall for me. I love the sleek design, the removable attachment piece, and the fact that my wipes don't get dried out! However, the button to pop open the wipe dispenser is very long, so it will often open up if something randomly hits it. Also, you can't pack it too full of wipes because the dispensing mechanism does not allow for them to come out easily without ripping (I use huggies wipes). If I could get the dispenser from the Pampers Aqua Pure, on the Oxo Tot container, with the Huggies wipes, it would be perfect lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a portable wipe container! It is thin and easy to use! I had to lug around a big container for my dog’s grooming wipes while out and about, and it always made our hikes clunky. This product is very sleek, takes up much less volume in my hiking bag and easy to use! I love the color as well! A+
customer_reviews.author: Laylia

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for mine and my fiancé’s diaper bags. (Mine is a book bag style and his is a messenger bag style). Cute and matched my diaper bag. My diaper bag has a pocket to easily access wipes in cases like this and it fit perfectly, but it never would stay closed. It resulted in dozens of wipes drying out. It’s to the point where I don’t use it anymore and it’s become a waste of my money. It doesn’t seem to be much of a problem for my fiancé’s messenger bag style diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline D. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good wipie holder
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great for traveling. Keeps wipies good, doesn't dry then out. Keeps a lot of wipies in, maybe around 20 wipies Love the handle where you can put it in your hands or stroller or something.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to have in your diaper bag on vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this prior to our weeklong vacation. (I didn't want to lug around a completely full package of wipes in the diaper bag all week) Every day before we left our room, I filled this dispenser with enough wipes for the day (it holds maybe 15-20 wipes) and that worked perfectly. It's super easy to open for refills, and even easier to open one-handed to take out a wipe when needed. It doesn't take up much space at all in my small diaper bag and it has a strap if you want to just hook it onto your stroller handle or whatever. I love this thing and will definitely continue using it long term.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I want to buy one for everyone I know that has kids. I can't get enough of this wipes dispenser. I know that might sound silly but I'm sure you moms will understand. There is a nice weight to this and both closures (the one on the side and the one for the lid) are sturdy. It is well made. I really love the brand OXO for baby and toddler items. I already have two of these and plan on buying the bigger one for the baby's changing table!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Joliada

customer_reviews.title: Not a great design
customer_reviews.text: After having my original wipes case break after many years I gave this one a try... the only reason I still have it is because I am trying to find a replacement. The top pops open all the time - even just sitting in the bag pocket. So, then my wipes dry out and have on occasion gotten other things in my bag wet and damp from the wipes top being open. I really wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L Van Ness

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I realized
customer_reviews.text: OXO products are always well made and this is no exception. I can see where it would be handy to hang on a stroller or from a diaper bag, but I should have read the description better. It's larger than I expected and not really right for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: D Allen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: my first one last about 3 months before the lid broke off. Figured I'd try again because I like the look of it and the little strap is useful. However. My second one lasted less than one day! Once again, thenlid broke off of it. Terrible quality, 0 stars! Waste of money, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: It leaks slowly
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and easy to use, but it leaks. This is the reason my overall rating is only 2 stars. This product is designed to hang which is why it has straps but hanging it causes the liquid to leak out. Not right away, but it will eventually - slowly. I bought 4 for different locations and all 4 leaked.
customer_reviews.author: DaKind

customer_reviews.title: OK...but not great
customer_reviews.text: holds several wipes, probably better than a plastic bag but doesnt stap closed = whole thing pops open if too many wipes and it gets jostled the erong way, flap pops open on a semi- random basis andxall your wipes are dry gefore you know it. bit tot container good, this one...meh.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Best suited for refill packs. Has sat in the car outside on hot summer days and wipes are still wet. Leads me to believe it seals well. Time will tell if it will stay closed and if the lid doesn’t break. Been using for 6 months and so far fills the bill.
customer_reviews.author: KOz

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: The product works great! Keeps wipes on deck when needed and it is sealed tight so they don’t dry out. Really can’t complain about this at all. Would def recommend to parents on-the-go or people that simply need wet wipes for other obvious reasons!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a solid couple months. Kept wipes wet. But it kept popping open in my bag haha. Then one day the whole top came off. Luckily it was empty. Popped it back in. We'll see. Haha
customer_reviews.author: KBottom

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: We buy the type of wipes, that you can refill big tubs with... it was hard to lug around when you're on the go. This case solved that issue for us. It jolds ebough wipes for when youre away all day with baby. We purchases a second case so we can keep one in each diaper bag for the kids. Not only isnit functional, it saves a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Whynotchestnut

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: sturdy does not hold a lot of wipes but I expected that from the compact size. what I dont like is that it will not stay closed inside of my bag when I reach for wipe the case is already open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box !
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great box and keeps the wipes safe, moist and secure. We have tried different sorts of wipes and all fit just fine. You can even conveniently hang it on a bag outside. Only thing that I can complain about is that the button to open it,is very easy to push and sometimes when it’s in my diaper bag it opens accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: The Goss Family

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Wanted something to put in the diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wanted something to put in the diaper bag so I didn't have to carry a Costco sized pack if wipes around and this worked perfectly! I take about 1/2 inch of wipes maybe a little more and stick them in then put the rest of the pack in my wipe warmer. They stay moist just make sure you clear any stuck in the rim before closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough for baby wipes and a heavy duty, sturdy plastic case. It's a little heavier than I hoped to put in a travel bag but will work nicely. Shipped timely
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Parris

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger
customer_reviews.text: I like the travel container. My only thing is that I hoped it would hold more wipes than it can, but it holds up really nicely. I love the color and it’s simple.
customer_reviews.author: Shebah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my diaper bag because it looked cute. Well, it is cute and easy to use . However, it could have been a little smaller and flatter. Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an extra storage for wipes for the stroller. Had it stored in the stroller a few hours and wipes dried out. Not worth buying!!
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wipes wet, durable casing, easy to pull out wipes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. Its not bulky and holds enough wipes for a day trip. It also keeps the wipes damp. I've left a small stack in the case without use for over a week and came back to them still wet and useable. Wipes come out very easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: Ok Wipes Container
customer_reviews.text: This container keeps the wipers wet. However, for the wipes I use, it doesn’t allow for one handed wipe dispensing. Every time, I get more than one wipe which means I have to open the case and put the extra wipes back in.
customer_reviews.author: M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Okay!
customer_reviews.text: Hold very little wipes maybe 20 or 25. Keeps them moist. Not really worth what I paid. There have got to be better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is very durable and I love the color I just wish it held more wipes. You can't put very much in the dispenser and if you put too many, it is really hard to pull them out even if you can get it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jinger Yawn

customer_reviews.title: but it isn't perfect. However
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep in the car for my windex wipes because I'm always finding smears on my windshield. It helps keep them moist longer, but it isn't perfect. However, for my purpose it's fine. I just added some water when it was too dry, and they are back to work.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Shallow
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have for wipes, but it's pretty shallow so you can't get that many wipes in it and I refill it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Won't Stay Closed
customer_reviews.text: This fits the wipes well but just won't stay closed. It pops open at a single touch, which seems silly being that it is meant to be attached to things like strollers where you will run into it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for the diaper bag and one for the car. I don’t use either because it seemed unnecessary. I tried using one and it was harder to get the wipes out one at a time than it was from the original package.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Best diaper bag investment ever. Keeps wipes wet. Holds about 30 ish wipes depending on the company used. I have to refill it about every 2 outings. Having noticed that something the dispensing lid does pop open in the bag if pressure is put just right.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely perfect! I didn’t expect much for the price but looking at it I would have paid more. Very well made and very cute. It fits perfectly in the diaper bag side pocket and holds a significant amount of wipes considering it’s travel sized.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Can't wait til the quarantine is over and I can start going out places to take advantage of having this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this! And was so annoyed when we started using it (after the return period of course ugh) and it wouldn't stay closed after only a few uses. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Serena s

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: The on the go wipes dispenser is exactly as described. It perfectly holds a decent number of wipes, keeping them moist/wet as though they were still in their original packaging. This dispenser has a nice, sturdy case, the teal accents and the rubber handle can be used to attach the dispenser to a stroller or bag, or simply carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: WonderfulNaomi

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We normally use cloth wipes, but we use disposable water wipes for travel and the plastic piece that covers the package opening kept falling off and drying out the expensive wipes. I bought this and it has solved the problem. Love it! Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: G Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 0 if I could. The wipes dried out, & the thing doesn’t even close anymore. I used it twice
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: (Reviewing on my husband’s account) I use this with my diaper bag. It’s perfect size and keeps wipes moist. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love this wipe holder! It’s sturdy and holds a good amount of wipes for the go.
customer_reviews.author: Ryane

customer_reviews.title: Fair product
customer_reviews.text: Wipes pull out one at a time. Still lets wipes dry overtime as there is no "gasket" to seal the container. Overall good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D. Maiers

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice one, but id want a little bit more wipes to fit
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Sireaeva Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for feminine wipes in my nightstand, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy and comfortable is to use . Keep wipes moist and it’s easy to carry. Good material, arrived fast
customer_reviews.author: Mile123

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty large and heavy for what it is. And my husband's gripe with it is you can't just yank a wipe out with one hand (while your other is holding baby's legs etc) -- you must use two hands to get a wipe out.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.  Withstands being left in a dark colored car in Florida.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I haven't had any issues like other reviewers. As long as it's not over full it stays closed even with the bag being tossed all over and abused and mistreated. We just keep it in the car and the Florida heat has yet to damage it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this. I will be using for cloth wipes. It is very well made and seems durable. Because it has the strap you can either put it in the diaper bag or just hang it on the side or on the stroller. Very versatile!
customer_reviews.author: breanna

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Hard to use and doesn’t hold many wipes. The strap comes off so easy. I don’t use it due to lousy quality
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gray

customer_reviews.title: Lid Opens Accidentally Often
customer_reviews.text: This works good in my diaper bag. My original plastic one that came with it broke (Gotta love kids!) so I purchased this one. The one downside, which is a fairly big deal, is that the opening opens really easily and opens if the diaper bag gets lightly bumped. But I keep an eye on it and close it regularly so the wipes don't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but really not practical it doesn’t hold enough wipes at all, far too thin. Even for a short day out...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The product is bigger than what I thought however it is really durable and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mari.Feliz

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This fits our diaper backpack perfectly and holds wipes, but not as many as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: MEA

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: Love to use these vs having the big pack of wipes bc it saves space. I didn't have any problems with the wipes staying moist either so all around great product
customer_reviews.author: cnavarro

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wipes holder!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very handy wipes holder. We were looking for wet wipes holder when we came to know about this product. It's very easy to use and holds up to 20-25 wet wipes. Higly recommended during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Avnish

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: I love oxo products and was very happy with this when it arrived. Unfortunately, after light to moderate use it no longer closes. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Far better than skiphop holder. Skiphop broke quicjky this one is being thrown around my by toddler and it only ooens up but it’s not breaking so far. Sleek design and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tijana

customer_reviews.title: It wipes out the competition.
customer_reviews.text: It travels well, holds up well and it keeps the wipes moist.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding cleansing cloths!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to hold disposable cleansing cloths. Good seal to keep them moist.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for travel or to keep beside the couch love the durability.
customer_reviews.author: victor jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this product is very good. help you when you buy baby wipes that aren't correctly sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus T.

customer_reviews.title: Wipes dry out guick
customer_reviews.text: The wipes dry out pretty quick. I've been out and about and go to get a wipe and they are all dried up -_- it's a nice case, just make sure you check it before going out!
customer_reviews.author: Kamster513

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the baby wipes safe and maintains the moisture.it opens easily if another object brushes against the push button so u need to ensure that the lid is closed always.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy as a replacement. Works great, fits on the side of the diaper bag so no opening it up and getting the wipes out, the side of this case pops open.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not for diaper bag compartment use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to refill but too easy to open. If you happen to accidentally tap the button while in the diaper bag , the door opens leaving your wipes exposed to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty convenient for me to take baby out. I don’t have to take a heavy pouch of wet wipes but take this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Huixin pan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold enough wipes.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great BUT it didn’t hold enough wipes for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ferras

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to put wipes in for my diaper bag but wipes lost they’re moisture after one day. The package isn’t designed well enough to keep wipes moist. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and convenient for on the go and even if your bag is full u can always attach it to the handle or straps or even on strollers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great OTG wipes container
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to fill, use, and take on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Curry

customer_reviews.title: good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about the price but did not want to get a cheaper container that would break or dry out. This came nicely packaged and was worth every penny. its durable, looks nice and hold a good amount of wipes. I love that you can strap it to basically anything without worrying about it falling and breaking
customer_reviews.author: S. O.

customer_reviews.title: it does open very easily
customer_reviews.text: if you put it on the baby bag it will open very easy. thats the only reason why it didn't get a 5 star. perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is convenient to have, but it tends to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is convenient to have, but it tends to pop open a lot which ends up with dried wet wipes. I'm thinking I may have to use tape to keep it closed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Edwina P.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold much
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit very many wipes and the lid doesn't stay shut very well. The slightest touch of the button and the lid flings open.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer May

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, closes all the way and keeps wipes from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something more compact for the diaper bag than a whole pack of wipes. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyce Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Dry wipes
customer_reviews.text: Wish I hadn’t wasted my money on not one but two of these. The wipes dry out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps wipes moist for long periods of time, also very convinient and hooks right onto your diaper bag for travel. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Another Hit from Oxo
customer_reviews.text: Just got their soap dispenser for kitchen and love it. This product for travel wipes is awesome. Slim yet durable and holds a good quantity of wipes. Soft shell versions ripped after a while.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Lid does not stay closed leading wipes to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This wipe dispenser works great. Clicks open and closed just fine! Exactly what I needed for wipe refills!!
customer_reviews.author: Spiderbeth

customer_reviews.title: Too small - Not as good as the flexible options
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought the flexible Huggies container again. Hard shell is not worth what you give up for capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Teomo Tomek

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a must have for traveling with baby. Nice packaging and material.
customer_reviews.author: JZJewlry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep wipes in tote
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to keep Lysol wipes in your tote or in the car. I just refill as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza A.

customer_reviews.title: Wipes dry out
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing purchase. I bought 2 - one for my daughter and one for me. The design is nice but the wipes dry out within a day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, and it case as described and on time
customer_reviews.author: Teresa E

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers! I bought my first one used, and after a day I knew I had to order another one. I use one in my purse to hold folded up toilet paper. I am really sensitive to a lot of brands, so it’s much better for me to be able to carry my own toilet paper. This makes it easily accessible, discrete, and convenient. Love!
customer_reviews.author: MAllen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Till now i didn't use it, but from the first look it seems ok, quality is good but not sure will it keep my wipes fresh or they will dry after a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: World shopper

customer_reviews.title: Poor seal
customer_reviews.text: Not air tight. Wipes dry out overnight & leaks if left on side.
customer_reviews.author: emily p

customer_reviews.title: Kinda nice
customer_reviews.text: I wish they made a size a bit larger. Great for a small outing.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Easy open but holds hardly any wipes.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The only great thing is the easy open flap. It barely holds any wipes. If you over stuff it it makes it impossible for you to take one wipe out without it ripping into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Container fits multiple sized wipes. Really happy with the quality and the price.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN DANNER

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this. Holds the moisture in, fits in the diaper bag, all good!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I love this wipe dispenser 💚 what more can I say? It’s compact, convenient, colorful and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: As the reviews stated, it pops open from time to time. Shame since it is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Yesi S

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your money they have better designs now dries out wipes
customer_reviews.author: Love Hard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it's just a little small, only able to hold like 10 wipes.
customer_reviews.author: LU

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight
customer_reviews.text: Good for short term wipe use, but will dry out if left in there for more than a week at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and it is very compact and fit perfectly inside the diaper bag..
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Lives up to the oxo name. Sturdy and def worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep wipes moist
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a slim, small wipe holder for my diaper bag. It is slim and small, but unfortunately, this wipe container doesn’t keep wipes moist at all.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: OXO Tot On-the-Go Wipes Dispenser, Teal
product_meta.description: Whether it's for on-the-go diaper changes or clean-up after a snack at the park, the OXO Tot On-the-Go Wipes Dispenser is perfect for keeping wipes handy while on the move. A simple, one-handed push of the button reveals a large opening for easy access to wipes that easily dispenses one wipe at a time. The handy strap means you can secure it to your stroller or diaper bag handles, and the slim shape easily tucks into bags or purses. Now, you never have to be caught in a sticky situation.
feature_bullets: Keeps wipes on hand for quick access on the go
Large button for easy, one-handed opening
Silicone tether securely attaches Dispenser to strollers or diaper bag straps
